description: This file defines the root navigation structure for a Flutter app, implementing a bottom navigation bar with multiple tabs for different features such as Dashboard, Students, Staff, Attendance, Schedule, Messages, and Alerts.

classes.name: RootNavigation
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages bottom tab navigation for the app.

classes.name: _RootNavigationState
classes.description: State class managing the selected tab index and rendering the corresponding screen.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the RootNavigation widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including the Scaffold with body and bottom navigation bar.
